name: Pattern Making Kit ğŸ
description:
This kit includes various pattern templates. Create simple patterns with a grid of rectangles or complex kaleidoscope-like mesmerizing graphics. A couple of components use auto-layout to enable you to make patterns of any size.

ğŸ¼ Usage
Edit one component and see the pattern change on the preview. Then export the frame or copy it as PNG. Paste the image anywhere in Figma and set fill mode to Tile. This will fill the whole shape with the seamless pattern you created!
